full_summary:
########################################################

**Government of Canada Tender Invitation**

### Project Title
Special Event Coordinator for Jasper Indigenous Exhibit Grand Opening – Jasper National Park

### Solicitation Number
5P420-22-0014/B

### Contact Information
 Ryan Taylor, Contracting Authority
 [ryan.taylor@pc.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.taylor@pc.gc.ca)
 587-436-5987
 1-866-246-6893 (Fax)

### Project Summary
Parks Canada is seeking a Special Event Coordinator to plan and host the grand opening of the Jasper Indigenous Exhibit at Jasper National Park. This three-day event is anticipated to include approximately 200 formal attendees from Indigenous Partner groups.

### Key Requirements
- Provide professional services for event planning and coordination
- Manage a team to ensure successful execution of the event
- Coordinate logistics, catering, and supplier arrangements
- Ensure compliance with National Parks Regulations and the National Park Act

### Important Tender Information
- This procurement is set aside for Indigenous Businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)
- Bids must be submitted via email or fax, using the designated email address or facsimile number
- Bid documents must be attached to the email as a single file, or sent in multiple emails with clear labels
- Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted

### Tender Closes
2022-12-09T16:00:00

### Additional Information
Parks Canada has made every effort to provide equivalent documents in both official languages. However, if any discrepancies are found, please notify the Contracting Authority immediately.

Tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's tendering service website at: [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

### Attachments
- RFP 5P420-22-0014/B
- Amendment 1 to RFP 5P420-22-0014/B
- Invitation to Bid 5P420-22-0014/B
- DDP 5P420-22-0014/B

### Notes
National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act. Late submissions will not be considered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Language of Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
